description: If flowers are your favorite part of spring, you're going to want to add these destinations to your bucket list.
maintext: If flowers are your favorite part of spring, you're going to want to add these destinations to your bucket list.Some of the most beautiful sites in the world for flower lovers include the Wisteria Flower Tunnel in Japan and the cherry blossoms in Washington, D.C See more destinations in the video above or the gallery below for some serious floral-induced wanderlust.
title: Breathtaking flower blooms all over the world
